alert.note: Alert for Austin; Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 4:01PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL AUSTIN... NORTHWESTERN FORT BEND...SOUTHEASTERN WALLER AND NORTHWESTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CST... At 400 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brookshire, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Katy, Jersey Village, Brookshire, Spring Branch North, Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Valley, northern Eldridge / West Oaks, Fulshear, Simonton, Hilshire Village, Pattison, Spring Branch East, Spring Branch Central, Fairbanks / Northwest Crossing, Langwood, Willowbrook, Westbranch, Cypress, and Greater Inwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CST for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Fort Bend; Inland Harris; Waller
